local_text:

Maaf Kar mere gunah tujhse 
Meri fariyaad hai    ||Aaj|| 

1. Dosto ka saath hai aur hai 
Gunah ki zindagi (2)

Ab Rooh Meri barbaad hai (2)   ||Maaf|| 

2. Ho chuka hu heen ithna 
Khud pe apna bus nahi (2) 
Shaitan ki bataon sehi
Zindagi barbaad hai (2)  ||Maaf||

Aao milkar ham kare 
Ishwar ka dhanyavaad

Ab bhi hai mere saath (2)

khud ka jaan diya(2)
Aur hamari zindagi ko 
jeevan daan diya 

1.Choda usne swarg loak ko
Aaya tha dharti par 
Khud ko usne bali kiya hai 
Krus pe praan ko dekar 
Saare daag dho diya 
paapon ka ham par se 
Yeshu ne ham ko saaf kiya 
dhokar apnay lahoo me 

2. Beeth gaye hai mosam kitne 
Aur beethe hai raina 
Uske pyaar me badthi hi jathi 
Hai mere jivan ki naiyya Aao milkar ham gaaye 
Ek naya sargam 
Baaki jivan ham bithaye 
prabhu me har dam

Aaya masih duniya me tu 
Paapi yon ko bachane ko 
Laye eeman jo bete par,
Karega paar is duniya ko

2. Bethlehem ke maidaano me,

4. Samudr ke sab laharo par,

Ai mere dil, sadaa

Wo he tera meet gayeja

Apna man ka sitar

Wo he tera meet gayeja

2. Uskee ashish pe

Our rehem se bhara 
Dhuk ke ghadimyomen bhi 
Yaad karke usay 
Gham me bhi muskura 
Wo he tera meet gayeja

2. Deep jalaye, raha niharun 
Darshan ko, prabhu darshan ko

Baso dil mein  ||Deep||

Dharthi aakash dono 
Prabhu ki aavaz sunenge 
Sansaar ke sab praani,
Uska hi naar lenge 
Dharthi aakash dono 

1. Pabhu ka vachan aisa hai,
Jo chiraag sa jalta hai 
Us par koi chalta hai,
Jeevan use milta hai 
Uske niyam ko jo mane,
Woh kabhibhi na bhatkenge 
sansaar ke sab praani 

2. Pabhu ka samay aata hai,
Dharthi magan hoagi,
Uski daya barsegi,
Aur door jalan hoagi,
Uske vachan ki mahima 
Aur shakthi ham dekhenge sansaar ke sab praani 

3. Ankhe uthakar dekho,
Prabhu ka din aayega 
Usko grahan jo karega, 
wahi saath jaayega 
Jisne prabhu ko na maana,
Woh ek din royega 
sansaar ke sab praani

Duniya ke rahon me chalte 
Ruk jana jawan 
Apne manzil ko dhyan se 
Pehchana hai kya 
Sansaar ke ashavon se tum 
Behlate ho kya 
Tera hi dil ka soonapan 
Woh ye duniya nahi bharega 
Aao tute dil se... Aao pure manse 
Aa bahon me uske ... woh hi dega tujhko 
Jeevan shanti aur jai 
Bharpur Jeeevan shanti aur Jai 

1. Kitne bar tum 
Prabhu ki aawaz ko suna 
Phir bhi thukrathe hue 
Jahan me khogaye... (2) 
Par apne bahe phailakar 
Pyar se pukara tumhe 
Ab duniya ko tum chodkar 
Laut aao masih ke paas (aao...)  

2. Wakt hai kam abhi 
Duniya ka anth hovega 
Jis tarah vachan me likha 
Masiha aayega...(2) 
Ab tum ek nirnay lekar 
Arpan karo swayam ko 
Tumhare dil me yishu aakar 
Dega jeevan naya tuhje (aao..)

Tu aaja Ghar lout aa 
Aaa be pe Ghar lout aa 
Tu aaja Ghar lout aa

Tu Sach aur Jhootu ko 
Ab Maaf le (2)

Aa bepe Ghar lout aaa (2) || Duniya ||

Ek aag har dil mei 
humko jalaana hei 
bhatke hue dil ko 
Prabhu se milaana hei 

1. Sansaar ki aasha bhari 
nazarein hum hi par hein 
uddhar ka sandesh bhi 
kaandho ke upar hei 
ek deep se laakhon diye -2 
humko jalaana hei 
bhatke hue...

2. Itne saral ye raste 
kal na khule honge 
prachaar ke awasar hamein 
hansil nahi honge 
taiyaar rahna kal hamein -2 
khud ko mitaana hei 
bhatke hue...

Ek hi parameshwar hai 
Ek susamachar hai 
Ek hi to kam hamara 
Prem ka prachar hai 

1. Jisne mana prabhu ko 
Jisne priya jana 
Zindagi ko usi ne aaj pahchana 
Wohi to rah hai, wohi sachhai hai 
Wohi to zindagi, wohi aadhar hai, 

2. Aao milke jahan men chalen,
badte jayen 
Har kisi ko, vachan uska sunayen 
Jahan men jane ko 
Kya tum taiyar ho 
Tumhare hothon men 
Kya susamachar hai 

3. Ham sabhi ka, yahi to ek kam hai 
Har kahin per, dena paigham hai 
Dekho har rah per, gunahon men duba 
Har rahi chahta, masih ka pyar hai

Gaaoonga mai Tere hi geeth 
He Yeshu thu hai mahaan 
Tera hi naam mere masih 
Leta hun subh aur shaam 

1. Jab mai gunaho me pada 
Tere prem se mai door tha 
Tere sanmukh aane ke layak 
Mai kKadapi yoagya na tha (2) 
Par thu hi mera sahara bana 
Apne paas mujhe bulaya 
Is liye masih hoato se apni 
Sthuthi teri karunga 

2. Tere anugrah, teri daya ko 
Kaise bhool mai masih 
Mere shraap ko tune hata kar 
Khud shraapith bana masih 
Tune krus par lahoo 
Bahaakar mujhe 
Paapon se shuddh kiya 
Mere aasuon ko ponch kar 
Saare dhukh door kiya

Ham geet masi tere gayenge 
Gayenge gayenge gayenge 
Tu kitna pyara, pyara hai 
Is duniya ko bathlayenge 
Bathlayenge bathlayenge 
Tu sab se nyara, nyara hai 

1. Ye duniya hai pyasi pyasi 
Aur janam janam ki dukhiyari 
Hai dhoond rahi hai ye 
aanken tujh ko (2) 
Tu nirbal ka sahara hai 

2. Ab paar lagao ishu mere 
Is bhatki jeevan nayya ko 
Tu marg, satya aur jeevan hai 
Is dil ne tujhe pukara hai

Ham sabka hai thuhi sitara 
Param pithane hai - thuj ko bheja 

1. Ek sitara aa chamka purab Ki... 
Hi jaanib se 
Thu Masiha ban ke aaya 
Ham sab keliye swarg se 
Zami pe thu thahaya 
Bethlehem ke astabal mein 
Salib utake thune pukara 
Maanavatha ko us karz se 
O Yeshu pyare thu saagar hai Daya ka 
Thune sab ka jeevan savara  || Hum Sab || 

2. Ham sabhi ko thune paya 
Adharm ke darshan mein 
Papiyo ne thujhe sathaya 
Apne us chalbar se 
Muskara ke thune kaha tha 
He pita inhe maaf karna 
Na samajh hai yeh loag sare 
Ye na jane yeh kya kar rahe hai 
Oa Yeshu pyare 
Thu hi hai hamara 
Thujhko sab ne milke pukara (2) || Hum Sab ||

Jab se pyara Yesu aaya,
Mera jeevan badal gaya 
Jab se maine useh hay paya 
Mera jeevan badal gaya

3.Mujhe kharida hai masih ne

Main hun uska, mera na koi,
Sivai uske 
Putru ne hai pita se milaya 
Mera jeevan badal gaya 

4.Meri rahon main na kante 
Ab rahenge 
Meri manzil meri mautham 
Ab na honge 
Ho gaya door hay mauth saya 
Mera jeevan badal gaya 

5.Raat kaali beet gayi hai Hua savera 
Subha ka tara, dekho chamka

Is liye main ne ye geet gaya 
Mera jeevan badal gaya

2. Uddhar mukti keval Yeshu mein

tere sharan
pawan kare hamko
dukh ke mare, sab hai bechare

sab ka palan hara

local_title: Naam liyo re, naam liyo re

local_text:

1. Dil me dheemi awaj aayee 
Apne gunahom ko maan
Jaan liya maine awaj uski 
Jiska kiya apman 

2. Iman laye tujhpe masiha 
Aye tumhare paas 
Maaph karo ab paap hamare 
kardo lahu se saaf

Rahi chalta ja Rahi chalta ja 
Prabhu tere jo sath hai  
Rahi chalta ja Rahi chalta ja 

1. Rah andheri hai, koi na thikana 
Door sitara chamke 
Wahi tum teharna 
Yahi teri manzil, yahi hai sahara 

2. Kahi tum bhatak na jana 
Yahi hai voh rasta 
Le jayenge tujhko milne 
Duniya ke raja se 
Yahi teri manzil, yahi hai sahara

Sahara mujhko chahiye 
Sahara de mujhe Khuda 
Mujhe sambhal ke main gira
Mujhe sambhal mere Khuda 

1. Kathin hai raste bahut 
Har ek mood pe khatar 
Andhere sayon ko hata 
Dikha do ab mujhe sehar 

2. Jahan ke raaston pe mein 
Akela chal na paunga 
Jo chalna chahu bhi agar 
Phisal ke geer mein jaunga 

3. Ye bojh jo gunaho ka 
Mein oothaye chal raha 
Oothayega agar koyee 
Voh tu hi hai mere Khuda

Sampurna Jeevan mera
 Prabhu tumhara hai
 Pyare Prabhu tu mere
Jeevan ka sahara hai

1. Jab mein gunaho mein khoya tha 
Paapon mein bilkul soya tha 
Apne pavitra lahu se 
Dhoya tumhe ne paapon ko 
Dhokar mujhe ab shudh kiya 
Mere hriday ko saaf kiya 

2. Tujh se jab main bhatak gaya 
Jeevan ko tune sahara diya 
Accha charvah ban ke 
Tune mujhe ab dhund liya 
Ab se prabhu main gaunga 
Tera vachan mein sunaunga 

3. Prabu ne mujhko bacha liya 
Paapon ka bhoj bhi hata diya 
Anugraha shanti aur prem diya 
Apnejeevan se bhar diya 
Papon se mann phiraon tum 
Dil se vishwas lao tum
